name: Project Reality
storyline:
Eons ago, two races ruled over EARTH.....but you already know this story, don't you?

I grant you one simple task.

Either befriend the monsters...or kill them all in cold blood.

Will you be monsterkind's ANGEL, or will you bring about doom and chaos as the KNIGHT...?

In the end...your choices don't matter, do they?
summary: A fangame that uses the same roles as Storyshift, but uses them in a very different way. Project Reality will contain the same original characters you love, and some new ones as well...
